roleset.name: fill with joy
roleset.note: RAVISH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'ravish' based on dictionary.com. Verbnet entries 31.1. (from ravish.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: that supreme Beauty, which-1 *trace*-1 ravished the souls of those Eastern men,
example.arg: the souls of those Eastern men,
